message: Help section of mini node server

ping.description: If you see an answer, it means that it is up
ping.answers: 200 OK when it goes ok, 400 and above when something crashed or well, you get a timeout that means that the endpoint is dead

discover.description: Will show the available endpoints that we offer
discover.answers: 200 OK on success, >400 on any other weird error

reception.description: Here we receive the messages and are deferred to be processed
reception.answers: 200 OK on success, > 400 on any other error
